personal.name: Ali Emad SALEH
personal.bio: Senior IT Infrastructure Specialist with 5+ years of experience in networking, virtualization, and government technology solutions. Expert in managing enterprise systems serving 1600+ users and 50,000+ citizens.
personal.tagline: Building robust infrastructure solutions for enterprise and government sectors.

custom_sections.about_me: I'm a passionate full-stack developer with expertise in modern web technologies. I love solving complex problems and building applications that make a difference.
custom_sections.philosophy: Clean code, continuous learning, and user-centric design are at the core of everything I build.
custom_sections.current_focus: Currently exploring cloud architecture and machine learning integration in web applications.
